responsibilities: Build, scale, and deliver high-quality digital products and services.
Solve customer challenges through human-centered experiences, digital core modernization, and intelligence everywhere (AI/ML and data).
Help customers succeed in building digital capabilities that integrate technology into the core of their business.
skills: Proficient MLOps culture experience and application.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on building and delivering digital products, solving customer challenges through human-centered experiences, and integrating technology into business cores. The mention of "intelligence everywhere (AI/ML and data)" suggests a broad use of AI and machine learning, but it does not specifically mention Generative AI or language models.

The skills required include MLOps culture experience, Azure, and Recommendation Systems, which are related to machine learning and AI infrastructure. However, there is no explicit mention of skills related to Generative AI or language models, such as natural language processing, text generation, or working with specific LLM frameworks or tools.

Overall, while the job involves AI/ML, there is no direct indication that it specifically involves working with Generative AI or language models.
